docs.title: Welcome to Cash.io
docs.text:
Welcome to Cash.io App! Your all-in-one solution for fast, secure, and easy money transfers. This guide will walk you through how to get started and use key features.

What you can do:

  • Send & receive money

  • Link bank accounts & cards

  • Pay bills

  • View transactions

  • Secure your account

docs.title: Download & Install
docs.text:
Available on iOS and Android

Search for Cash.io app in the App Store or Google Play

docs.title: Create an Account
docs.text:
1. Open the Cash.io app.

  2. Enter your mobile number or email.

  3. Enter the verification code sent to you.

  4. Set a secure password or passcode.

docs.title: Link a Payment Method
docs.text:
1. Go to Settings > Payment Methods.

  2. Add your debit card or bank account.

docs.title: FAQs
docs.text:
How do I reset my PIN or passcode?

Go to Settings > Security > Reset Passcode.

Are transactions instant?

Yes, most transactions are instant. Some bank transfers may take 1–2 business days.

Can I cancel a payment?

Only pending payments can be canceled. Go to Activity > Select Transaction > Cancel.

docs.title: Pay a Bill
docs.text:
1. Open the Cash.io app.

  2. Tap the Pay icon. This takes you to the Bill Payment Dashboard.

  3. Select Add a Biller. Choose from your list of previously paid billers or tap Add New Biller.

To Add a New Biller:

  • Search by name (e.g., “Verizon,” “Con Edison,” “Capital One”).

  • Select the correct provider from the search results.

  • Enter Your Account Details:

    1. Input the account number or customer ID used by your biller.

    2. Confirm the billing zip code or any other required identifier.

    3. Tap Continue.

  • Enter payment amount and tap Next.

  • Confirm payment details:

  • Biller name

  • Payment amount

  • Payment method

  • Tap Pay Now. Payment will appear in your Activity tab.

docs.title: Pay by QR Code:
docs.text:
1. Tap the QR Scanner icon.

  2. Point at the merchant’s code.

  3. Confirm amount and pay.

docs.title: Notes & Tips:
docs.text:
• Some payments may take 1–3 business days to process depending on the biller.

  • Always confirm that your account number and biller name are accurate before submitting.

  • Use the auto-pay option for recurring bills (e.g., monthly subscriptions).

docs.title: To Send Money:
docs.text:
1. Tap Send.

  2. Enter the amount.

  3. Enter the recipient’s phone, email, or $Cashtag.

  4. (Optional) Add a note.

  5. Tap Pay.

docs.title: To Request Money:
docs.text:
1. Tap Request.

  2. Enter amount & recipient details.

  3. (Optional) Add a note.

  4. Tap Request.

docs.title: To Receive Money:
docs.text:
1. The amount will appear in your balance.

  2. Tap Cash Out to move it to your linked bank.

docs.title: View Balance & Activity:
docs.text:
1. Tap the Home tab for your current balance.

  2. Tap Activity for your transaction history.

docs.title: Enable Security:
docs.text:
1. Turn on Face ID/Touch ID or passcode.

  2. Enable push notifications for transactions.

docs.title: How to Add a Debit Card or Bank Account
For Debit/Credit Cards:
docs.text:
1. Open the Cash.io app on your device.

  2. Tap the profile icon in the top-right corner (or tap your profile photo if shown).

  3. Scroll down and select Payment Methods.

  4. Tap Add Debit Card.

  5. Enter your card number, expiration date, CVV, and ZIP code.

  6. Tap Add Card to confirm.

Tip: Make sure your card is active and not expired.

docs.title: For Bank Accounts:
docs.text:
1. From Payment Methods, tap Link Bank Account.

  2. Choose your bank from the list or use the manual entry option. If prompted, log in securely through your bank’s portal (uses Plaid or similar service).

Alternatively, enter:

  1. Routing Number

  2. Account Number

  3. Account Type (Checking/Savings)

  4. Tap Confirm to complete the setup.

docs.title: How to Remove or Replace a Card/Bank Account
To Remove a Card:
docs.text:
1. Open the Cash App.

  2. Tap your profile icon.

  3. Go to Payment Methods.

  4. Select the card you want to remove.

  5. Tap the three dots (⋮) in the top corner.

  6. Choose Remove Card.

  7. Confirm removal when prompted.

docs.title: To Replace a Card:
docs.text:
1. Remove the existing card (follow steps above).

  2. Tap Add New Card and enter the new card details.
